content: introducing the vintage wobble afghan crochet pattern a delightful project suitable for all skill levels this easy-level pattern creates a cozy afghan or throw measuring approximately 47 w x 66 l the pattern features a reversible design worked in one piece from the bottom up forming a classic rectangle shape with written instructions stripes/colorwork and a helpful video tutorial with captions crocheters can easily follow along and create their own stunning afghan be sure to check out the history of this pattern on the blog **unique features-** reversible design one-piece construction written pattern instructions worked flat stripes/colorwork includes chart video tutorial with captions available **materials needed-** hook 6mm us size 10 0 yarn red heart with love https //www mooglyblog com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/tunisian-vintage-wobble pdf 4/worsted/aran weight 2800-2900 yards
